Name: Seed of Evil
About the game: Seed of Evil is an epic adventure to uncover the secrets of the Water City, Somonden. Follow Anna as she explores the upper and lower parts of the city to uncover the truth of the defilement plaguing its inhabitants. Enjoy this amazing story filled with mystery, drama, and intrigue. It'll be one you won't soon forget. Make sure you check out this RPG brought to you in native English! Features Classic RPG Gameplay Immersive Characters and Story Explore a Post-Apocalyptic World No Grinding Required Gain Experience and Level Up Through Doing Good Deeds
